metadata.title: CVE-2016-3105 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The convert extension in Mercurial before 3.8 might allow context-dependentattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted git repository name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
mercurial-common - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1').
